i.in:sp: select org.preferredid,(case when org.organizationfoundedyear is null then null else cast(org.organizationfoundedyear as varchar) +'-' + lpad(cast(nvl(org.organizationfoundedmonth,1) as varchar),2,'0') + '-' + lpad(cast(nvl(org.organizationfoundedday,1) as varchar),2,'0') end ) from eanorganization as org where org.preferredid is not null

(case when org.organizationfoundedyear is null then null else to_date(cast(org.organizationfoundedyear as varchar) +'-' + lpad(cast(nvl(org.organizationfoundedmonth,1) as varchar),2,'0') + '-' + lpad(cast(nvl(org.organizationfoundedday,1) as varchar),2,'0'),'yyyy-mm-dd') end)

This provides a list of International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) for all active bonds of a given organization.
i.i: A:1L A:2 A:J
i.in:sp: select distinct org.preferredid,b.isin from eaninstrument b join eanorganization org1 on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid=org1.preferredid join eanorganization org on case when org.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org.preferredid else org.prefultimateparentorganizationid end=case when org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org1.preferredid else org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid end where 1=1 and b.LegacyAssetType='DEBT' and b.AssetState='AC' and b.isin is not null and b.InstrumentCommonName not like '%MATd' and org.preferredid is not null

i.d: This provides a list of Reuters Instrument Codes (RICs) for all active bonds of a given organization.
i.i: A:1L A:2 A:J
i.in:sp: select distinct org.preferredid,q.ric from eaninstrument b join eanquote q on q.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization org1 on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid=org1.preferredid join eanorganization org on case when org.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org.preferredid else org.prefultimateparentorganizationid end=case when org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org1.preferredid else org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid end where 1=1 and b.LegacyAssetType='DEBT' and b.AssetState='AC' and b.isin is not null and b.InstrumentCommonName not like '%MATd' and org.preferredid is not null and q.assetstate = 'AC' and q.ric is not null

i.d: This provides a list of EJV Asset ID for all active bonds of a given organization.
i.i: A:1L A:2 A:J
i.in:sp: select distinct org.preferredid,b.ejvassetid from eaninstrument b join eanorganization org1 on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid=org1.preferredid join eanorganization org on case when org.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org.preferredid else org.prefultimateparentorganizationid end=case when org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid is null then org1.preferredid else org1.prefultimateparentorganizationid end where 1=1 and b.LegacyAssetType='DEBT' and b.AssetState='AC' and b.ejvassetid is not null and b.InstrumentCommonName not like '%MATd' and org.preferredid is not null

i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, orgdesc.organizationshortdescription from eanorganization org join eanorganizationshtdescription orgdesc on org.organizationid = orgdesc.organizationid where org.preferredid is not null and (orgdesc.effectiveto is null or orgdesc.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0') and orgdesc.languageid = 505062

i.d: Company Business Summary.

i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, EAN_BS_CASE_WHEN_EAN orgdesc.organizationshortdescription EAN_BS_CASE_ELSE_EAN from eanorganization org EAN_BS_LEFT_OUTER_JOIN_EAN join eanorganizationshtdescription orgdesc on org.organizationid = orgdesc.organizationid and orgdesc.languageid = EAN_BS_LANGID_EAN EAN_BS_JOIN_DESC2_EAN EAN_BS_LANGID_ENGLISH_EAN where org.preferredid is not null and (orgdesc.effectiveto is null or orgdesc.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0') EAN_BS_DESC2_EFF_EAN

Provides a full list of Private Equity Backed Codes
Org Is Public Flag
Org Is Public Flag
Org Is Public Flag
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, CAST(org.ispublic AS BOOLEAN) from eanorganization org where org.preferredid is not null and org.ispublic is not null

i.d: This is for internal use only and should not be exposed to external consumers. Organization tier is used to classify the OA universe into smaller parts based on certain criteria and repaper or carry out the regular and periodic maintenance of data for the entities.
i.in:sp: SELECT org.preferredid, org.organizationtier FROM eanorganization org WHERE org.preferredid IS NOT NULL

i.d: City of Headquarters
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, CAST(c.organizationaddresscity AS CHAR(50)) from eanorganizationaddress c join eaninstrument b on c.preferredid = b.prefissuedbyorganizationid and c.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eanquote a on b.preferredid = a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: City of Headquarters
i.in:sp: select org.organizationid, CAST(org.organizationaddresscity AS CHAR(50)) FROM eanorganizationaddress org where org.addresstypecode = 'HEA' and org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: City of Headquarters
i.in:sp: select distinct org.preferredid, CAST(org.city AS CHAR(50)), geo.geographylatitude as latitude, geo.geographylongitude as longitude FROM eanorganizationaddress5 org left outer join geographyname geo on org.cityid = geo.geographyid where org.addresstypecode = 'HEA' and org.effectiveto IS NULL and org.organizationid IS NOT NULL and org.languageid = (select max(aaa.languageid) from eanorganizationaddress5 aaa where aaa.organizationid = org.organizationid and aaa.addresstypecode = 'HEA' and aaa.effectiveto IS NULL)

i.d: Country of Headquarters
Region of the Organisations Headquarters
Minor Region of the Organisations
State or Province of Headquarters
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, CAST(c.organizationaddressstateprovince as CHAR(50)) from eanorganizationaddress c join eaninstrument b on c.preferredid = b.prefissuedbyorganizationid and c.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eanquote a on b.preferredid = a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: State or Province of Headquarters
i.in:sp: SELECT org.organizationid, Cast(org.organizationaddressstateprovince AS CHAR(50)) FROM eanorganizationaddress org where org.addresstypecode = 'HEA' and org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: Country Code for Organization Headquarters, ISO 3166 standard.
Map of countries to currencies.
i.in:sp: select g.GeographyID, g.UniqueName as CountryUniqueName, g.ISO2Code as CountryISO2Code, g.ISO3Code as CountryISO3Code, g.PrimaryCurrencyId,c.UniqueName as CurrencyUniqueName, c.ISOCode as CurrencyISOCode from EANGeography g left join EANCurrency c on g.PrimaryCurrencyId=c.CurrencyId where g.IsCountry=1 order by CountryUniqueName
Geography ID;Country Name;Country ISO2 Code;Country ISO3 Code;Primary Currency ID;Unique Name;Currency ISO Code

i.d: Indicates if an organization is currently private equity backed.
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, c.pebackedstatus from eanorganization c join eaninstrument b on c.preferredid = b.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote a on b.preferredid = a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Indicates if an organization is currently private equity backed.
i.in:sp: SELECT org.organizationid, org.pebackedstatus FROM eanorganization org WHERE org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: Organization Sub-Type Description

i.d: City of Legal Registration
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, CAST(c.organizationaddresscity AS CHAR(50)) from eanorganizationaddress c join eaninstrument b on c.preferredid = b.prefissuedbyorganizationid and c.addresstypecode = 'LREG' join eanquote a on b.preferredid = a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: City of Legal Registration
i.in:sp: select org.organizationid, CAST(org.organizationaddresscity AS CHAR(50)) FROM eanorganizationaddress org where org.addresstypecode = 'LREG' and org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: Country of Legal Registration
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, CAST(geo.geographylongnameenglish AS VARCHAR(60)) from eangeography geo join eanorganizationaddress c on c.organizationaddresscountrygeographyid = geo.preferredid join eaninstrument b on c.preferredid = b.prefissuedbyorganizationid and c.addresstypecode = 'LREG' join eanquote a on b.preferredid = a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Country of Incorporation, also known as Country of Legal Registration.
i.in:sp: SELECT org.organizationid, Cast(geo.geographylongnameenglish AS VARCHAR(60)) FROM eanorganization org JOIN eangeography geo ON org.incorporatedingeographyid = geo.preferredid WHERE org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: Primary Quote RIC
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, c.ric as PrimaryRic from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid left join eanquote c on c.preferredid = b.mainquoteid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Primary Instrument RIC
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, e.ric from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization c on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid = c.preferredid join eaninstrument d on c.prefprimaryinstrumentid = d.preferredid join eanquote e on d.mainquoteid = e.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Instrument Name
Where available provides the name of the organisation most commonly used.
i.in:sp: select issueid, orgcommonname from ec_eancache union all select instrumentpi,indexcommonname from eanindex

select preferredid, commonname from (select org.preferredid, cast(org.commonname as varchar(350)) as commonname, org.mainquoteid, org.organizationid from eanorganization org union select fnd.preferredid, cast(fnd.commonname as varchar(350)) as commonname, null, null from eanfund fnd) org where org.preferredid is not null

select preferredid, commonname from (select org.preferredid, cast(org.commonname as varchar(350)) as commonname, org.mainquoteid, org.organizationid from eanorganization org union select fnd.preferredid, cast(fnd.commonname as varchar(350)) as commonname, null, null from eanfund fnd) org where org.preferredid is not null

i.d: Country of Headquarters, also known as Country of Domicile.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, geomap.country from eanorganization org join eanorganizationaddress addr on org.preferredid = addr.preferredid and addr.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eangeography geo on addr.organizationaddresscountrygeographyid = geo.geographyid join mapregion geomap on geo.iso2code = geomap.iso2code where org.ispublic = 0

i.d: Country Code for Organization Headquarters, ISO 3166 standard. Also known as Country of Domicile.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, geo.iso2code from eanorganization org join eanorganizationaddress addr on org.preferredid = addr.preferredid and addr.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eangeography geo on addr.organizationaddresscountrygeographyid = geo.geographyid where org.ispublic = 0

i.d: Region of the Organisations Headquarters
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, geomap.region from eanorganization org join eanorganizationaddress addr on org.preferredid = addr.preferredid and addr.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eangeography geo on addr.organizationaddresscountrygeographyid = geo.geographyid join mapregion geomap on geo.iso2code = geomap.iso2code where org.ispublic = 0

i.d: Minor Region of the Organisations
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, geomap.minorregion from eanorganization org join eanorganizationaddress addr on org.preferredid = addr.preferredid and addr.addresstypecode = 'HEA' join eangeography geo on addr.organizationaddresscountrygeographyid = geo.geographyid join mapregion geomap on geo.iso2code = geomap.iso2code where org.ispublic = 0

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Sector Code. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, Industry Group, Industry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select instrument.instrumentpi, NAICS.code from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on (substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) = NAICS.code or (NAICS.classlevel=1 and length(naics.code)=5 AND substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) >= Substr(naics.code, 0, 2) AND substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) <= Substr(naics.code, 4, 2) )) join eanindustryscheme indscheme on ind.industryschemeid = indscheme.industryschemeid join eaninstrument instrument on org.preferredid = instrument.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote quote on instrument.mainquoteid = quote.preferredid

select org.preferredid, naics.code from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on (substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) = NAICS.code or (NAICS.classlevel=1 and length(naics.code)=5 AND substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) >= Substr(naics.code, 0, 2) AND substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 3 ) <= Substr(naics.code, 4, 2) )) and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Subsector Code. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Subsector, Industry Group, Industry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select instrument.instrumentpi, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 4) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join eanindustryscheme indscheme on ind.industryschemeid = indscheme.industryschemeid join eaninstrument instrument on org.preferredid = instrument.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote quote on instrument.mainquoteid = quote.preferredid

select org.preferredid, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 4) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Subsector Description. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Subsector, Industry Group, Industry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid , NAICS.name from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 4 ) = NAICS.code and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Industry Group Code. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, Industry Group, Industry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select instrument.instrumentpi, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 5) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join eanindustryscheme indscheme on ind.industryschemeid = indscheme.industryschemeid join eaninstrument instrument on org.preferredid = instrument.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote quote on instrument.mainquoteid = quote.preferredid

select org.preferredid, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 5) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Industry Group Description. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, Industry Group, Industry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid , NAICS.name from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 5 ) = NAICS.code and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) InternationalIndustry Code. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, InternationalIndustry Group, InternationalIndustry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select instrument.instrumentpi, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 6) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join eanindustryscheme indscheme on ind.industryschemeid = indscheme.industryschemeid join eaninstrument instrument on org.preferredid = instrument.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote quote on instrument.mainquoteid = quote.preferredid

select org.preferredid, substring(ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 6) from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) InternationalIndustry Description. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, InternationalIndustry Group, InternationalIndustry and Activity.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid , NAICS.name from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on substring ( ind.latestindustrycode, 0, 6 ) = NAICS.code and org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) NationalIndustry Code. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, Industry Group, Industry and NationalIndustry.
i.in:sp: select instrument.instrumentpi, ind.latestindustrycode from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join eanindustryscheme indscheme on ind.industryschemeid = indscheme.industryschemeid join eaninstrument instrument on org.preferredid = instrument.prefissuedbyorganizationid join eanquote quote on instrument.mainquoteid = quote.preferredid

select org.preferredid, ind.latestindustrycode from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on ind.latestindustrycode = NAICS.code where org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: Primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) NationalIndustry Description. NAICS Classifies companies with increasing granularity by Economic Sector, Business Sector, Industry Group, Industry and NationalIndustry.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, naics.name from eanindustry ind join eanorganizationrelationship rel on ind.industryid = rel.relationobjectid and rel.relationshiptypeid = 310066 join eanorganization org on rel.relatedobjectid = org.organizationid join ec_NAICS NAICS on ind.latestindustrycode = NAICS.code where org.ispublic = 0 and (rel.effectiveto is null or rel.effectiveto = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.0')

i.d: The full Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS) Schema in a single request.
i.in:sp: SELECT a.code, a.name, b.code, b.name, c.code, c.name, d.code, d.name FROM ec_gics a JOIN ec_gics b ON b.classlevel = 2 AND ( Substr(b.code, 0, 2) = a.code ) JOIN ec_gics c ON c.classlevel = 3 AND ( Substr(c.code, 0, 4) = b.code ) JOIN ec_gics d ON d.classlevel = 4 AND ( Substr(d.code, 0, 6) = c.code ) WHERE a.classlevel = 1
Sector Code;Sector Name;Industry Group Code;Industry Group Name;Industry Code;Industry Name;Sub-Industry Code;Sub-Industry Name

i.d: Provides the full Thomson Reuters Business Classification Schema in a single request.
i.in:sp: SELECT a.code, a.name, b.code, b.name, c.code, c.name, d.code, d.name, e.code, e.name,a.industryid as economicpermid, b.industryid as businesspermid,c.industryid as industrygrouppermid,d.industryid as industrypermid,e.industryid as activitypermid FROM ec_trbc a JOIN ec_trbc b ON b.classlevel = 2 AND ( Substr(b.code, 0, 2) = a.code ) JOIN ec_trbc c ON c.classlevel = 3 AND ( Substr(c.code, 0, 4) = b.code ) JOIN ec_trbc d ON d.classlevel = 4 AND ( Substr(d.code, 0, 6) = c.code ) JOIN ec_trbc e ON e.classlevel = 5 AND ( Substr(e.code, 0, 8) = d.code ) WHERE a.classlevel = 1

Economic Sector Code;Economic Sector Name;Business Sector Code;Business Sector Name;Industry Group Code;Industry Group Name;Industry Code;Industry Name;Activity Code;Activity Name;Economic Sector PermId;Business Sector PermId;Industry Group PermId;Industry PermId;Activity PermId

i.d: Provides the full North American Industry Classification System in a single request.
i.in:sp: SELECT a.code, a.NAME, b.code, b.NAME, c.code, c.NAME, d.code, d.NAME, e.code, e.NAME FROM ec_naics a JOIN ec_naics b ON b.classlevel = 2 AND ( ( Length(a.code) = 2 AND Substr(b.code, 0, 2) = a.code ) OR ( Length(a.code) = 5 AND Substr(b.code, 0, 2) >= Substr(a.code, 0, 2) AND Substr(b.code, 0, 2) <= Substr(a.code, 4, 2) ) ) JOIN ec_naics c ON c.classlevel = 3 AND ( Substr(c.code, 0, 3) = b.code ) JOIN ec_naics d ON d.classlevel = 4 AND ( Substr(d.code, 0, 4) = c.code ) JOIN ec_naics e ON e.classlevel = 5 AND ( Substr(e.code, 0, 5) = d.code ) WHERE a.classlevel = 1
Sector Code;Sector Name;Subsector Code;Subsector Name;Industry Group Code;Industry Group Name;International Industry Code;International Industry Name;National Industry Code;National Industry Name

Legal Registration Phone

i.in:sp: select preferredid, mxid from (select org.preferredid, org.mxid , org.mainquoteid, org.organizationid from eanorganization org union select fnd.preferredid, fnd.mxid, null, null from eanfund fnd) org where org.preferredid is not null
select org.preferredid, org.ndaorgid from eanorganization org where org.preferredid is not null

i.d: Organization level permanent identifier. (OA Permid, Organization Permid, etc)
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid,org.organizationid from eanorganization org where org.preferredid is not null

i.d: Reporting Entity PI (Integer)
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, r.reportingentitypi from eanquote a join EANReportingEntity r on a.prefprimaryreportingentityid = r.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Reporting Entity (Alphanumeric)
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.primaryreportingentitycode from eanquote a where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: The immediate parent organization of this organization
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, d.commonname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization c on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid = c.preferredid join eanorganization d on c.prefimmediateparentorganizationid = d.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: The ultimate parent organization of this organization
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, d.commonname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization c on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid = c.preferredid join eanorganization d on c.prefultimateparentorganizationid = d.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: The succeeding organization of this organization
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, d.commonname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization c on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid = c.preferredid join eanorganization d on c.prefsucceededbyorganizationid = d.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: The ultimate succeeding organization of this organization
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, d.commonname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eanorganization c on b.prefissuedbyorganizationid = c.preferredid join eanorganization d on c.prefultimatelysucceededbyorganizationid = d.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Date an instrument delists
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),0,5) + '-' + substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),5,2) +'-' + substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),7,2) end, org.instrumentid, fd.futuredatevalue, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end from eaninstrumentfuturedate fd join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org on org.instrumentpi = fd.instrumentpi where fd.rdcpropertyid is null and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Instrument Common Name
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, org.instrumentid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else fd.effectivefrom end, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end from eaninstrumentfuturedate fd join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org on org.instrumentpi = fd.instrumentpi where fd.rdcpropertyid = 27207 and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Forward looking ISIN changes and their history.
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, org.instrumentid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else fd.effectivefrom end, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end from eaninstrumentfuturedate fd join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org on org.instrumentpi = fd.instrumentpi where fd.rdcpropertyid = 27229 and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Future changes to Security Identifier issued in Germany by the Wertpapier Mitteilungen
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, org.instrumentid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else fd.effectivefrom end, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end from eaninstrumentfuturedate fd join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org on org.instrumentpi = fd.instrumentpi where fd.rdcpropertyid = 27319 and org.mainquoteid is not null

select org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, org.instrumentid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else fd.effectivefrom end, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end from eaninstrumentfuturedate fd join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null, x.instrumentpi, x.instrumentid from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org on org.instrumentpi = fd.instrumentpi where fd.rdcpropertyid = 27211 and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Quote Retire Date
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),0,5) + '-' + substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),5,2) + '-' + substring(cast(fd.effectivefrom as varchar),7,2) end, qte.quoteid, fd.futuredatevalue, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi where fd.rdcpropertyid is null and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Round Lot Size
i.in:sp: SELECT org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, qte.quoteid, CASE WHEN fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 THEN null ELSE fd.effectivefrom end, CASE WHEN fd.effectiveto = 99991231 THEN null ELSE fd.effectiveto END FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi WHERE fd.rdcpropertyid = 115340 AND org.mainquoteid is NOT null

i.d: Ticker Symbol
i.in:sp: SELECT org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, qte.quoteid, CASE WHEN fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 THEN null ELSE fd.effectivefrom end, CASE WHEN fd.effectiveto = 99991231 THEN null ELSE fd.effectiveto END FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi WHERE fd.rdcpropertyid = 32970 AND org.mainquoteid is NOT null

SELECT org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, qte.quoteid, CASE WHEN fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 THEN null ELSE fd.effectivefrom end, CASE WHEN fd.effectiveto = 99991231 THEN null ELSE fd.effectiveto END FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi WHERE fd.rdcpropertyid = 27373 AND org.mainquoteid is NOT null

SELECT org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, qte.quoteid, CASE WHEN fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 THEN null ELSE fd.effectivefrom end, CASE WHEN fd.effectiveto = 99991231 THEN null ELSE fd.effectiveto END FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi WHERE fd.rdcpropertyid = 27369 AND org.mainquoteid is NOT null

i.d: Get RIC rename history within specified time range for a given RIC
i.in:sp: select ean.quoteid, ean.identifiervalue, ean.preferredid, ean.validfromwithtime, CASE WHEN ean.validtowithtime = to_timestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00') THEN null ELSE ean.validtowithtime END from eanquoteidentifier as ean join (select distinct ean1.quoteid from eanquoteidentifier ean1 where ean1.identifiervalue in ({{RICList}}) and ean1.eanidentifiertypeid=29) as quotetable on ean.quoteid = quotetable.quoteid where ean.eanidentifiertypeid=29

i.d: Date an quote is suspended
i.in:sp: select org.preferredid, fd.futuredatevalue, qte.quoteid, case when fd.effectivefrom = 17530101 then null else fd.effectivefrom end, case when fd.effectiveto = 99991231 then null else fd.effectiveto end FROM eanquote qte join ( select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, y.organizationid from eaninstrument x join eanorganization y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyorganizationid union select y.preferredid, x.mainquoteid as mainquoteid, x.preferredid as instprefid, null from eaninstrument x join eanfund y on y.preferredid = x.prefissuedbyfundid ) org ON org.instprefid = qte.prefisquoteofinstrumentid JOIN eanquotefuturedate fd ON qte.quotepi = fd.quotepi where fd.rdcpropertyid = 114292 and org.mainquoteid is not null

i.d: Instrument Is Active Flag
Instrument Type
Instrument Type Code
List of all Thomson Reuters Instrument Types
Primary Instrument Flag

i.in:sp: select ins.instrumentpi, ins.instrumentcommonname from eaninstrument ins where ins.instrumentpi is not null
select a.quoteid, b.instrumentid from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Depository Receipt Type
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, t.adrtypename from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join(select b.valuedomainenumerationvalue as adrtypecode, c.valuedomainenumerationname as adrtypename from valuedomain a join valuedomainenumerationkey b on a.valuedomainid = b.valuedomainid join valuedomainenumerationname c on b.valuedomainid = c.valuedomainid and b.valuedomainenumerationid = c.valuedomainenumerationid where a.valuedomainid = 1001315393) t on b.adrtype = t.adrtypecode

i.d: Depository Receipt Quantity
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, cast(b.drquantity as float) from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Depository Receipt Ratio
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, cast(b.drratio as float) from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Depository Receipt Underlying Instrument Quantity
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, b.drunderlyinginstrumentquantity from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Depository Receipt Underlying Quote RIC
i.in:sp: select ins.instrumentpi, qte.ric from eaninstrument ins join eanquote qte on ins.drunderlyingquotepi = qte.quotepi

i.d: Depository Receipt Underlying Quote Name
i.in:sp: select ins.instrumentpi, qte.quotecommonname from eaninstrument ins join eanquote qte on ins.drunderlyingquotepi = qte.quotepi

i.d: Depository Receipt Underlying Quote Currency
i.in:sp: select ins.instrumentpi, curr.isocode from eaninstrument ins join eanquote qte on ins.drunderlyingquotepi = qte.quotepi join eancurrency curr on qte.quotecurrencyid = curr.preferredid

i.d: Depository Bank Name
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, o.commonname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eaniqmrelationship r on r.relationobjectid = b.instrumentid and r.effectiveto = 99991231 join eanorganization o on r.relatedobjectid = o.organizationid and r.relationshiptypeid = 1001302025

i.d: Depository Bank Ric
i.in:sp: SELECT distinct a.quoteid, dq.ric FROM eanquote a JOIN eaninstrument b ON a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid JOIN eaniqmrelationship r ON r.relationobjectid = b.instrumentid AND r.effectiveto = 99991231 JOIN eanorganization o ON r.relatedobjectid = o.organizationid AND r.relationshiptypeid = 1001302025 JOIN eanquote dq ON dq.preferredid = o.mainquoteid

i.d: 144A Registered Flag. 144a registered securities are controlled and restricted securities that are allowed to be sold for a particular length of time before registration.
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.IsRule144aRegistered from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Call Put Option
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, b.callputoption from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Country where the instrument trades
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, d.country from eaninstrument b join eanquote a on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eangeography c on a.quotecountrygeographyid = c.preferredid join mapregion d on c.iso2code = d.iso2code where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: ISO2 country code where the instrument trades.
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, cast(c.iso2code as char(2)) from eaninstrument b join eanquote a on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join eangeography c on a.quotecountrygeographyid = c.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Exchange Market Identifier Code (MIC)
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.mic from eaninstrument b join eanquote a on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: The settlement period is the number of days between the transaction date and the settlement date that is allotted to the parties of a transaction to satisfy the transaction's obligations. It is often quoted as T+1, T+2 or T+3; which means the transaction date plus one, two or three days
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.settlementperiod from eaninstrument b join eanquote a on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Exchange Market Identifier Code (MIC)
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.mic from eaninstrument b join eanquote a on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Exchange Name
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, mapexchanges.exchangename from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join mapexchanges on a.mic = mapexchanges.mic where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: List of all Filing Document Categories
Value Domain Level 1 Relationship
Value Domain Level 2 Relationship
List of all Credit Text Scores
List of all TRCS Regions
List of all TRCS Regions Countries
List of all League Table Items
Value Domain Lookup By Permid Id
Geograph Region Country Lookup By Permid Id
TRCS Fanout Lookup
Short Exchange Name
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, mapexchanges.exchangeshortname from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid join mapexchanges on a.mic = mapexchanges.mic where a.quoteid is not null

i.d: Exchange Region
Exchange Region
Region of Headquarters
i.in:sp: SELECT org.preferredid,geocmp.regionname,geocmp.regionid FROM eanorganization org join eanorganizationaddress addr on org.organizationid=addr.organizationid and addr.addresstypecode='HEA' join regiongeographycodemap geocmp on geocmp.orghqisocountrycode=addr.organizationaddresscountryiso31661alpha2code where org.organizationid IS NOT NULL

i.d: Primary Quote Flag
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, case when a.preferredid = b.mainquoteid then '1' else '0' end from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid where a.quoteid is not null
(case when a.preferredid = b.mainquoteid then '1' else '0' end)

i.d: ILX Identifier
Indicates if a Quote is a Composite
Internal unique permanent quote identifier.
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.quoteid from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid

i.d: Designation applied to a specified type of security such as common stock or fund. Different share classes within the same entity typically confer different rights on their owners.
i.in:sp: select a.quoteid, a.ShareClass from eanquote a join eaninstrument b on a.prefisquoteofinstrumentid = b.preferredid
